name: Mindtree Ltd
description: The world is evolving rapidly with transformative technological advancements, dynamic changes in economies, and a shifting global landscape. These changes make it challenging for our people, clients, partners, and communities to navigate the evolving landscape. At LTIMindtree, we constantly push the boundaries of what’s possible by leveraging our expertise, experience, and innovative ecosystem to empower enterprises, people, and communities to build a better Future, Faster. Together. To achieve this, we drive business transformation using what we are good at—technology, talent, and a robust ecosystem of partners—to eliminate all barriers to progress. Our commitment is to a singular goal: to relentlessly ensure our clients become their future sustainable selves ahead of schedule. We want to use technology to build intimacy, warmth, and empathy through the experiences we create. Our purpose is to unleash new possibilities and impact every human we touch. Our net-zero pledge leverages renewable energy, waste management, and a focus on the practices of a circular economy to ensure a healthier, safer, and more sustainable business.

Highlights.name: Leader in Digital Transformation
Highlights.description: LTIMindtree is a new kind of technology consulting company that helps businesses transform [1]. They are a merger of LTI and Mindtree, and are positioned to be a leader in digital transformation [1]. This means that LTIMindtree has the experience and expertise to help businesses of all sizes achieve their digital transformation goals.

Highlights.name: Combined Expertise from LTI and Mindtree
Highlights.description: LTIMindtree is a merger of LTI and Mindtree [1]. This means that LTIMindtree brings together the experience and expertise of both companies to offer a wider range of services to its clients [1]. This can be beneficial for businesses looking for a one-stop shop for all their digital transformation needs.

Highlights.name: Broad Range of Services
Highlights.description: LTIMindtree is able to offer a wider range of services to its clients [1]. This can include things like cloud computing, artificial intelligence, automation, and business process outsourcing. This can be helpful for businesses that are looking for a partner to help them with all aspects of their digital transformation journey.

enhanced_description: LTIMindtree is a technology consulting company, formed by the merger of LTI and Mindtree, specializing in digital transformation. They leverage their combined expertise, experience, innovative ecosystem, technology, and talent to empower enterprises, people, and communities. Their core mission is to drive business transformation, eliminate barriers to progress, and relentlessly ensure clients achieve their future sustainable selves ahead of schedule. LTIMindtree aims to create empathetic experiences through technology and offers a broad range of services including cloud computing, artificial intelligence, automation, and business process outsourcing. The company also demonstrates a commitment to sustainability with a net-zero pledge that incorporates renewable energy, waste management, and circular economy practices.
